'''Furnace''' may refer to:

== ''Minecraft'' ==
* {{Blocklink|Furnace}} – a block used to smelt items.
* {{ItemLink|Minecart with Furnace}} – an entity which can boost minecart speed.{{only|java}}
* {{BlockLink|Blast Furnace}} – a block that can only smelt metal and ore but twice as fast.
* {{BlockLink|Smoker}} – a block that can cook food twice as fast as a furnace.
* {{BlockLink|Campfire}} – a block that can cook food up to four items at a time without using any additional fuel.
** {{BlockLink|Soul Campfire}} – soul variant of campfire.

== ''Minecraft Earth'' ==
* {{EntityLink|Furnace Golem}} – a variant of an iron golem.
